summary: "Destroy Yourself" - is a 'primitive' film which breaks all the rules of film-making. It's the first Zanzibar film (and predates the very naming of the movement), an attempt to make a film ... See full summary »
cast: Caroline de Bendern|Juliet Berto|Thierry Garrel|Alain Jouffroy|Olivier Mosset|Étienne O'Leary|Jacques Robiolles
title: Détruisez-vous
